transcription.text: Women asking men this question conquered the internet in September. What makes this example funny is the manâ€™s surprise at such a specific question. Like most videos in the trend, he goes from confused to defensive when he realises he actually thinks about Rome a lot, like many other men according to the virality of the trend. Though a light-hearted prank-style meme, it can also be interpreted as demonstrating the link between idolising ancient Western history and toxic masculinity. To find out how, collect this display on your Lens and read more online.

work.title: How often do you think about the Roman Empire?
